entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Wainwright 06:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -33.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
